name: Desert Tycoon
summary:
Have you ever dreamed of building a mega-metropolis in the Arabian desert?
Play Desert Tycoon and become an Arabian business tycoon by building your dream city in the thriving Arabian emirate of Abu Lumba!
Start from humble Bedouin beginnings and progress step-by-step in building your business empire of real estate, business, energy, and tourism assets. Develop major industries and watch your economy grow right before your eyes as you expand your city and progress to new levels in the game!
